channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-19271] [ABFS]: NPE in AbfsManagedApacheHttpConnection.toString() when not connected
item.description: if AbfsManagedApacheHttpConnection.toString() is invoked and httpClientConnection is null, you get a stack trace.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
SLF4J: Failed toString() invocation on an object of type [org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsManagedApacheHttpConnection]
Reported exception:
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsManagedApacheHttpConnection.toString(AbfsManagedApacheHttpConnection.java:233)

        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsRestOperation.completeExecute(AbfsRestOperation.java:292)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsRestOperation.lambda$execute$0(AbfsRestOperation.java:258)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.statistics.impl.IOStatisticsBinding.measureDurationOfInvocation(IOStatisticsBinding.java:494)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.statistics.impl.IOStatisticsBinding.trackDurationOfInvocation(IOStatisticsBinding.java:465)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsRestOperation.execute(AbfsRestOperation.java:256)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsClient.getAclStatus(AbfsClient.java:1403)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.services.AbfsClient.getAclStatus(AbfsClient.java:1386)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.AzureBlobFileSystemStore.getAclStatus(AzureBlobFileSystemStore.java:1673)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.azurebfs.AzureBlobFileSystem.getAclStatus(AzureBlobFileSystem.java:1302)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.store.diag.AbfsDiagnosticsInfo.validateFilesystem(AbfsDiagnosticsInfo.java:626)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.store.diag.StoreDiag.executeFileSystemOperations(StoreDiag.java:774)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.store.diag.StoreDiag.run(StoreDiag.java:230)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.store.diag.StoreDiag.run(StoreDiag.java:172)
        at org.apache.hadoop.util.ToolRunner.run(ToolRunner.java:82)
        at org.apache.hadoop.util.ToolRunner.run(ToolRunner.java:97)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.store.diag.StoreDiag.exec(StoreDiag.java:1189)
        at org.apache.hadoop.fs.store.diag.StoreDiag.main(StoreDiag.java:1198)
        at storediag.main(storediag.java:25)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
        at org.apache.hadoop.util.RunJar.run(RunJar.java:330)
        at org.apache.hadoop.util.RunJar.main(RunJar.java:245)
2024-09-10 17:28:25,557 [main] DEBUG services.AbfsConnectionManager (AbfsConnectionManager.java:logDebug(204)) - Connecting [FAILED toString()] to https://stevelwales.dfs.core.windows.net:443
2024-09-10 17:28:25,672 [main] DEBUG services.AbfsConnectionManager (AbfsConnectionManager.java:logDebug(204)) - Connection established: stevelwales.dfs.core.windows.net:443:-1212034775
2024-09-10 17:28:25,713 [main] DEBUG services.AbfsConnectionManager (AbfsConnectionManager.java:logDebug(204)) - Connection cached: .....dfs.core.windows.net

saxenapranav opened a new pull request, #7040:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7040

When AbfsManagedApacheHttpConnection is not connected, the toString() fails with NPE, as it doesn't have `httpClientConnection.getRemoteAddress()` set.

This PR fixes this and removes dependency on connection being made. When the connection instance is constructed the required target host is shared. This field would be used in the logs.
